conclusion: Analyze the flow path of the liquid from points A, B, and C.
Liquid flows downward from A, encountering a green baffle directing it left.
Liquid flows downward from B, encountering a light blue baffle directing it right.
Liquid flows downward from C, encountering a green baffle directing it left.
Liquid from A is directed leftward after hitting the green baffle.
Liquid from B is directed rightward after hitting the light blue baffle.
Liquid from C is directed leftward after hitting the green baffle.
Liquid from A and C, directed leftward, will flow towards container D.
Liquid from B, directed rightward, will flow towards container E.
Liquid from A and C will flow into container D.
Liquid from B will flow into container E.
